CustomField.description: Blocks all modifications (through Modification Context) that are related to Trigger Context records in 'after insert', 'after update', 'after delete' and 'after undelete' trigger handlers. The system will throw BoostException when the code will try to modify such records. This type of operations should be executed in the Before triggers.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Blocks all modifications (through Modification Context) that are related to Trigger Context records in 'after insert', 'after update', 'after delete' and 'after undelete' trigger handlers. The system will throw BoostException when the code will try to modify such records. This type of operations should be executed in the Before triggers.
CustomField.label: Block trigger data changes
